CustomField.formula:
IF( ISBLANK(Quote_Accepted_Date__c), TRUE,
IF( AND(NOT(ISBLANK(Quote_Accepted_Date__c)), OR( CONTAINS($Profile.Name, 'Inside Sales'), CONTAINS($Profile.Name, 'Sales Manager'), CONTAINS($Profile.Name, 'Executive'), CONTAINS($Profile.Name, 'System Administrator') )) , TRUE, FALSE))
CustomField.label: Hide Add Product Button
